DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare Safety Immunogenicity mix sequence 2 different pentavalent vaccine ( Diphtheria-Tetanus- Pertussis , Hepatitis B Hib combination Vaccines ) single sequence Shan 5 infant .
DOC.brief_title: Phase IV Interchangeability Study Liquid Pentavalent Combination Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Healthy child age group six eight week Born normal gestational period ( 36 42 week ) Mother 's HBsAg assure negative . Father , mother legally acceptable representative properly inform study sign informed consent form . Parents willing fill Diary Card Administration immunoglobulin blood product since birth . Use investigational , onregistered drug , vaccine study vaccine ( exception OPV & BCG vaccine ) study period within 30 day precede first dose study vaccine . Previous vaccination evidence infection DTP Hib . History allergic disease reaction likely exacerbated component vaccine include allergy antibiotic . Major congenital hereditary immunodeficiency . Infants evidence disease fever , history allergic disease persistent hematological , hepatic , renal , cardiac respiratory disease sign CNS disorder time vaccination . Infants show follow reaction dose study vaccine withdrawn subsequent dos : body temperature 40.4 degree Celsius , persistent scream cry 3 hour within 48 hour vaccination , seizure , encephalopathy hypersensitivity reaction . Parent/s guardian subject unable maintain diary card Simultaneous participation clinical study
